name: SOUND BARRIER (Crash)
description:
CONTROLS:

ASD for the top half, JKL for the bottom half. Press notes to the beat. Changing halves will flip gravity. 

My submission to Mini Jam 107: Music. 

Because of the plugins involved, an HTML5 build seems impossible from what I understand. I will try to create a browser build before the final deadline, but otherwise, I have no choice but to keep it as a Windows build.
